attributes.action: extend the Blue badge parking scheme to parents of children with conditions such as Autism, Aspergers, Tourettes and ADHD.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Using public transport with a child with a condition such as Autism, Aspergers, Tourette's Syndrome or ADHD can be a very stressful experience for all involved. Blue Badges should be available to parents of children with these and other similar conditions to enable both children and parents to enjoy as normal a life as possible.
